mapper.select: SELECT no, cno, category, title, subtitle, poster, author, pudate, publisher, price, sale_price, stock, num FROM (SELECT no, cno, category, title, subtitle, poster, author, pudate, publisher, price, sale_price, stock, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, cno, category, title, subtitle, poster, author, pudate, publisher, price, sale_price, stock FROM book_s WHERE cno=#{cno} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/9.0) FROM book_s WHERE cno=#{cno}

select table1.cno, table1.category, table2.count from (select distinct cno as cno, category from book_s order by cno asc) table1 join (select count(category) as count, category from book_s group by category) table2 on table1.category=table2.category order by table1.cno asc
SELECT no, cno, title, poster, price FROM BOOK WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'

SELECT no, title, author, poster, category, price, sale_price FROM book_s WHERE
title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
author LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
